scripts.link: cd dist && npm link && cd .. && npm link ../reactUI/node_modules/react
scripts.dev-package: npm run clean && npm run bundle && node dist/SetupPackage.cjs
scripts.pre-package: npm run build && npm run dev-package
scripts.build-patch: npm run pre-package && npm version patch && cd dist && npm version patch && npm publish --access=public
scripts.build-minor: npm run pre-package && npm version minor && cd dist && npm version minor && npm publish --access=public
scripts.build-major: npm run pre-package && npm version major && cd dist && npm version major && npm publish --access=public
